summary: Provides automated functional tests that verify the integration of Intel oneAPI C++ and DPC++ compilers with the Conan toolchain system, including detection, configuration, and compatibility checks across platforms, as well as validation of MSBuild-based Visual Studio project generation and Intel-specific settings on Windows.
business_intent: Guarantee that Conan reliably supports Intel compilers, preventing regressions and ensuring correct build behavior for users on Linux, macOS, and Windows environments.
